Property.name: BASE_QUERY_EMPLOYEE_TIME
Property.Value:
SELECT TE.company_id COMPANY, TE.entry_date DATE, CL.name CLIENT, PR.name PROJECT, TT.description TASK, TE.hours HOURS, PW.pay_rate PAY_RATE, TE.billable BILLABLE
FROM time_entry TE, task_type TT, client CL, project_time PT, project PR, client_project CP, project_worker PW, user_account US
WHERE TE.task_type_id = TT.task_type_id AND PT.time_entry_id = TE.time_entry_id AND PT.project_id = PR.project_id AND PW.project_id = PR.project_id AND CL.client_id = CP.client_id AND CP.project_id = PR.project_id AND US.user_account_id = PW.user_account_id AND US.user_name = TE.creation_user

Property.name: BASE_QUERY_PROJECT_TIME
Property.Value:
SELECT TE.company_id COMPANY, TE.entry_date DATE, TE.creation_user EMPLOYEE, CL.name CLIENT, PR.name PROJECT, TT.description TASK, TE.hours HOURS, TE.billable BILLABLE
FROM time_entry TE, task_type TT, client CL, project_time PT, project PR, client_project CP
WHERE TE.task_type_id = TT.task_type_id AND PT.time_entry_id = TE.time_entry_id AND PT.project_id = PR.project_id AND CL.client_id = CP.client_id AND CP.project_id = PR.project_id

Property.name: BASE_QUERY_EMPLOYEE_TIMEEXPENSE
Property.Value:

FROM time_entry TE, client CL, project_time PT, project PR, client_project CP
WHERE PT.time_entry_id = TE.time_entry_id AND PT.project_id = PR.project_id AND CL.client_id = CP.client_id AND CP.project_id = PR.project_id
UNION
SELECT EE.company_id COMPANY, EE.entry_date DATE, CL.name CLIENT, PR.name PROJECT, -1 hourse, EE.amount AMOUNT, EE.billable BILLABLE
FROM expense_entry EE, client CL, project_expense PE, project PR, client_project CP
WHERE PE.time_entry_id = TE.time_entry_id AND PE.project_id = PR.project_id AND CL.client_id = CP.client_id AND CP.project_id = PR.project_id
